title: The Files are no longer accessible on my pixel 2 phone.
content:
I had some Video files on my pixel 2
I saved the files in Google Cloud Storage.
The Files are no  longer accessible on my  pixel phone.
Question     Are the files deleted from the Phone after the Back up ?
If Not where are they stored on the Phone ?
How do I retrieve My Videos from Cloud Storage.
I can not find the files anywhere I have  Searched.
If the Video files still remain on the Pixel 2  Can they be
Recovered with A file Recovery App ?
Thanks for your Support               Fred
